level.text: Taxicab stands shall be established at the locations listed in this section.
From Park Road to Irving Street, first layby south of Park Road on the west side, “No Parking Taxicab Stand.”.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: 17 DCRR § 40.116, Special Edition (September 28, 1970); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 3211 (May 5, 2000); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 55 DCR 6376 (June 6, 2008).
